ModMetaData.name: Rimazon
ModMetaData.author: papercrane1001(current) PunkyRoo(original)
ModMetaData.description:
When you need something NOW and are willing to pay the price.
Link to original: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2551753165
Like my mod? Donate at: https://ko-fi.com/papercrane1001
I use the MIT license: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT which mostly says that if you use my code, please give me credit.
GitHub at: https://github.com/papercrane1001/-1001-Rimazon-Continued
Version 1.0.0 For Rimworld versions 1.3, 1.4, and 1.6. The 1.4 works on 1.5.
